step1.title: Welcome, {{name}}!
step1.content1: We're excited to have you here! Let's take a quick tour to help you get started.
step1.content2: This will only take a moment, and you can skip it anytime.

step2.title: Dark Mode is Active
step2.content1: We've set your interface to Dark Mode by default to reduce eye strain and save battery life.
step2.content2: You can switch between dark and light themes anytime by clicking the theme toggle button.

step3.title: Where to Find It
step3.content: The theme toggle button is located in the top-right corner of your screen, next to your profile information.
step3.step1: Look at the top navigation bar on any page
step3.step2Moon: Find the moon icon button on the right side
step3.step2Sun: Find the sun icon button on the right side
step3.step3: Click it to switch between dark and light modes

step4.title: You're All Set!
step4.content1: That's it! You're ready to start using the platform.
step4.content2: Remember, you can always change your theme preference using the toggle button in the top-right corner.
